metadata.title: CVE-2019-19252 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: vcs_write in drivers/tty/vt/vc_screen.c in the Linux kernel through 5.3.13does not prevent write access to vcsu devices, aka CID-0c9acb1af77a.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'was needs-triage ESM criteria').
